Home.title: Acompáñanos a celebrar nuestra historia de amor en una tarde de Agosto en medio de un jardín de flores perennes.
Home.wedding:
Para la boda de

Jennifer Hail y

Fernando Villavicencio

SaveTheDate.paragraph1: Estamos en el 2024! En vez de métodos tradicionales, decidimos crear nuestro sitio web y así reducir comunicación a través de papel. Aquí te enterarás todo lo que necesitas saber sobre nuestra boda.
SaveTheDate.paragraph2: A través de nuestra página, recibirás avisos, invitaciones, noticias y más; creados por Jenn y Fern (Los novios). Alístate que lo bueno llegará a tu email.
SaveTheDate.paragraph3: En las próximas semanas, agregaremos más información a nuestro sitio web, incluyendo confirmación de asistencia (RSVP), información de hospedaje, horario de la ceremonia, y código de vestimenta (dress code).
SaveTheDate.paragraph4: Para empezar, llena el formulario con tu información; esto nos ayudará para mantenerte al día y hacerte llegar nuestra carta de agradecimiento por ayudarnos a celebrar nuestro mejor día de nuestras vidas.
SaveTheDate.error: ¡¿Qué pasó?! Por favor, revisa tu informacion y asegurate que tienes el email correcto y evita usar autofill.

ThankYou.title: Gracias
ThankYou.subtitle: ¡Por favor, revisa tú correo electrónico por un mensaje de bienvenida!

OurStory.title: Nuestro Historia
OurStory.content:
The story of Jenn and Fer is one of those "God works in mysterious ways" tales. In September 2018, through circumstances shaped by availability in his rotational program, Fernando found himself moving to Louisville, KY, instead of the other option, Chicago, IL. Little did he know, this change would become a pivotal moment in his life.

A few months later while on a trip to Mexico, Jenn rekindled her love for Latin music, a passion that led her to seek out salsa dancing lessons as soon as she returned home. She began attending classes and social dances held on Wednesdays at Play—a decision that would serendipitously align with Fernando's path.

Come January 2, 2019, Fernando, looking to broaden his horizons, made the choice to step out and immerse himself in the world of salsa. He discovered that Play also hosted lessons and a social dance every Wednesday. It was at this local bar, on the dance floor, where the rhythm of salsa would orchestrate the steps leading Jenn and Fer into each other's lives.

Registry.title: Translate Registry
Registry.content: We are so excited to celebrate our special day with all of you and are truly grateful for any contributions towards our future. If you wish to give a gift, we would be thrilled to receive something from our registry below. Thank you so much!

Schedule.title: Schedule
Schedule.intro:
We are overjoyed to have you join us on this beautiful journey as we become partners for life. It means the world to us to share in the warmth of your company on our special day. We have chosen a garden venue for our ceremony and a creative studio space for our reception, which we plan to transform with an abundance of fresh flowers.

To help you navigate our day with ease, please see the schedule below.
Schedule.content1: We know most of you are traveling to Michigan for the wedding, so we want to welcome everyone and kick off a fun weekend with a little welcome party! You can expect a casual, summer house party with home-made food (likely Ecuadorian style, aka made by Fernando), cold drinks and music in our backyard.
Schedule.content2: Infused with natural charm, the perennial garden at the Matthaei Botanical Gardens remains a favorite setting for treasured moments. Its tranquil beauty adds an enchanting touch to special occasions. We're excited to say "I do" in a location we can visit and enjoy year after year.

location2.title: Location:
location2.content:
Kimberly Maged Perennial Garden

Matthaei Botanical Gardens

1800 N Dixboro Road

Ann Arbor, MI 48105

time2.title: Time:
time2.content:
Saturday, August 10 at 4:30pm

Guests can experience the grounds and spend time in the gardens before our ceremony begins at 5:30pm.

Schedule.content3: The party continues at StudioStudio with an evening filled with heartfelt toasts, dinner from one of our favorite restaurants in Michigan and, of course, a good time on the dance floor. Nestled beside York Restaurant—an Ann Arbor favorite that sells everything one could need for fancy charcuterie—StudioStudio is an open and airy blank canvas for creative minds to use however they can imagine.
Schedule.heading4: Let us know if you can make it

FAQs.title: Translate Your Questions, Answered
FAQs.content1: Send one of us a text and we'll add it to the list here.

Things To Do.title: Cosas Para Hacer
Things To Do.intro:
We've lived in Ann Arbor for three years and have made a list of our favorite spots, but there are still so many on our wish list.

See our recommendations below, or check out this resource for more.
